list.abs: Ann 安安妮Anna 安娜Annabel 安纳贝尔Annabelle annals 年监年鉴编年史annalist 作者Anne 安妮anneal 退火焖火annelid 蠕虫Annette 安妮.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin annales (libri) 'yearly (books'), from annus 'year'

entry.def: If something is in the annals of a nation or field of activity, it is recorded as part of its history.

example.ex: He has become a legend in the annals of military history.
example.tran: 他已成为军事史上的一个传奇。

entry.def: Annals is used in the titles of journals of a particular field of academic research.

example.ex: It was published in the 'Annals of Internal Medicine'.
example.tran: 它发表在《内科医学年鉴》上。

means.word_mean: 1. reports of the work of a society or learned body etc
2. a chronological account of events in successive years

auth_sentence.content: How many acts put out a collection of their Greatest Hits before slowly fading away into the annals of music history?
auth_sentence.res_content: How many acts put out a collection of their Greatest Hits before slowly fading away into the annals of music history?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How many acts put out a collection of their Greatest Hits before slowly fading away into the annals of music history?

auth_sentence.content: This had NEVER ever been reported in anatomical studies in all the annals of anatomical literature.
auth_sentence.res_content: This had NEVER ever been reported in anatomical studies in all the annals of anatomical literature.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This had NEVER ever been reported in anatomical studies in all the annals of anatomical literature.

auth_sentence.content: The annals of theoretical biology are clogged with mathematical models that can be ignored or, when tested, fail.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The annals of theoretical biology are clogged with mathematical models that can be ignored or, when tested, fail.

stems_affixes.word_buile: anni=ann年,一年+vers转+ary表名词→一年转到一次→周年纪念日
super超过,过度+annu=ann年,一年+ate具有……的→过分老的
ann年,一年+al状态+s→一年状态的综合→纪年表,年鉴,年报
annu=ann年,一年+ity表名词→每年都有的→年金

stems_affixes.value_cn: 因落后于时代而废除, 勒令退学
stems_affixes.word_buile: super超过,过度+annu=ann年,一年+ate具有……的→过分老的

sentences.en: This was the greatest event in the annals of European integration.
sentences.cn: 这是欧洲统一史上最重大的事件。
